name: Meow Catch!
description:
Just a dev practice!
Thanks for the beginner's course by Blackthornprod.
Cheers!🍻 Meow!

How to play:
- Health is constantly dropping over time, if it reaches zero you will -10 points and get dizzy for seconds!
- Catch items you like (food / ball / mouse toy): Score↑
- Catch items you dislike (toothbrush / pill / soap) : Score↓ Health↑
- Combo provides extra score / penalty (up to ±5 points).
- Get as much points as you can in 45 seconds!

Score challenge:
- 60+ Bravo!
- 40~59 Well done!
- 20~39 Nice try!
- 19- Ooops..

Art: kyzamiz
BGM: Arcade Game BGM #2 by B.G.M
